fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Send your crows to watch a player's house tonight. You will know how many people visit them. Your crows will permanently mark each visitor. If the visitor is already marked, your crows will prevent them from visiting, and roleblock them. This will be processed before the visit itself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- With the Necromonicon, your crows will attack anyone who has a mark instead of roleblocking them, dealing a Powerful attack.
- Roleblocking and attacking players is astral, but sending your crows to a house is not.
